summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Enhanced Account Manager Dashboard for Enterprise Sales KPI Platform. All backend APIs (27/27) and frontend features (11/11) are working perfectly. Account Manager login, Kanban board, Blue Sheet probability calculation, Incentive Calculator, and Sales Metrics are fully functional.
passed_tests: Account Manager login (am1@salescommand.com / demo123) successful
Account Manager Dashboard loads with correct title and welcome message
KPI cards display Pipeline Value, Won Revenue, Active Opportunities, Activity Completion
Sales Metrics section shows Orders Won ($120,000), Booked ($120,000), Invoiced ($96,000), Collected ($72,000), Commission ($6,000)
Opportunity Pipeline Kanban board displays with all 7 stages (Lead, Qualification, Discovery, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost)
Opportunities appear in correct stages (Test Opportunity in Discovery, GFS Security Assessment in Proposal, TechCorp MSSP Expansion in Negotiation)
Calculate Probability buttons present on all opportunity cards
Blue Sheet modal opens with Buying Influences, Red Flags, Win Results sections
Blue Sheet probability calculation works with AI integration (72% calculated probability)
Incentive Calculator button opens calculator modal
Incentive Calculator has commission template dropdown with 5 templates
Incentive calculation works ($5,000 commission for $100,000 deal)
Global search bar is present and functional
Drag and drop instruction text visible in Kanban header
Commission templates API returns 5 templates successfully
Sales metrics API returns quarterly data
All CRUD operations for accounts, opportunities, activities work
Dashboard stats API returns correct KPI values
AI insights generation working with LLM integration
Pipeline stages API returns 7 configured stages
Kanban view API organizes opportunities by stage correctly
